name: Ignite
description:
This game was created as part of Byking's newcomer training program
Depending on your PC environment, the game may not run properly
Also, unforeseen problems may occur during the game
Please be aware of this

high-level magic command action game!
Magic will be used to defeat the oncoming enemies in an exhilarating command action!

Magic attack by command input, requires precise operation and instantaneous power.
The "Score Attack Battle" is all about eliminating large numbers of enemies and surviving longer.

How can you conquer "Ignite"?
A magical experience like no other!

“Ignite" is a game in which you play the role of "Ig," a wizard who controls fire.
The game is a fusion of magic command action and score attack.

It is an exhilarating magical command action that uses three types of unique magic and super magic to wipe out the ghosts of the remains.
Enjoy the thrill of burning everything with your flashy fire magic!



Accurate and unmatched command input and instantaneous force are important.
“Command input" with 4 different buttons.
Learn each magic command to destroy the enemy army faster and by more!

Score attack battle based on “WAVE system”
Battles progress by “WAVE system”.
Survive longer and achieve a High Score!



How can you conquer "Ignite"?
Experience magic like never before!
